title: Basic FOCUS Object
description: Base FOCUS object: all objects stored in the resource server must at least match this template.

url.description: Canonical resource identifier, without version number

owner.description: Identifier of the user or entity that first created this object (first sample)

creationDateTime.description: UTC DateTime of the creation of this object (first sample)

editor.description: Identifier of the user or entity that edited this sample.

editionDateTime.description: UTC DateTime of the creation of this sample

active.description: Tells whether the object is archived or can be accessed
